channel.title: Looking for a hoster (you will get all server donations) :)
channel.description:
looking for a hoster who can do a little bit of coding (also good at making forums, if possible) to host (and code a little bit) on my amazing custom 639 base. pm me here or on skype you will also get owner status on server.
regards,
Alex

item.title: Looking for a hoster (you will get all server donations) :)
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“Ashley, post:9, topic:464182”][quote author=xxalexxxx link=topic=568025.msg4124913#msg4124913 date=1350256830]
well, i got what i was looking for. good day to you all
[/quote]I hope they ruin everything for you.[/quote]
Don’t worry, his server won’t last longer then 2 - 4 weeks.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a hoster (you will get all server donations) :)
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

xxalexxxx:

tyb, I think i should be lit on fire too. sorry that you care enough to bitch about it being in the wrong section and most of all sorry about your downsyndrome.

We should have a contest, who turns to ash first. Probably me, seeing as you most likely have a much higher amount of body fat compared to me, more to burn, you know?

Niall:

what sort of specs do you need for hosting?

Oh god lol

@OP: Please, let Niall host your server. Just do it.
